meta.title: TransactionCollectionResponse - Models - API Reference
meta.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce Order Transactions API.

blocks.data: Response payload for the BigCommerce Order Transactions API.

items.description: A BigCommerce Transaction object describes a single transaction.

allOf.description: Payload to create a transaction in BigCommerce.

event.description: Store event that created the transaction.

method.description: The payment method: `credit_card` - a credit-card transaction; `electronic_wallet` - an online wallet; `store_credit` - a transaction using store credit; `gift_certificate` - a transaction using a gift certificate; `custom` - manual payment methods; `token` - payment token; `nonce` - temporary payment token; `offsite` - online payment off the site (e.g., PayPal); `offline` - payment method that takes place offline; `bigpay_token` - a transaction processed using bigpay_token.

amount.description: Amount of money in the transaction.

gateway_transaction_id.description: The transaction ID returned by the payment gateway for this transaction item.

test.description: True if the transaction performed was a test, or if the gateway is in test mode.

fraud_review.description: Result of gateway fraud review, if any. Default is `false`.

reference_transaction_id.description: Identifier for an existing transaction upon which this transaction acts.

offline.description: Offline payment (e.g., check or purchase order).

display_name.description: Display name for the offline payment.

payment_method.description: Text entered for the payment method in the control panel.

order_id.description: Identifier for the BigCommerce Order with which this transaction is associated.

payment_instrument_token.description: Token for an existing stored Credit Card used for this transaction, if any.

avs_result.description: Address Verification Service (AVS) result from the payment gateway.

street_match.description: AVS Code for street matching result.

postal_match.description: AVS Code for postal matching result.

cvv_result.description: Card Verification Value result from the payment gateway.

card_type.description: The credit-card type: Visa, MasterCard, etc.

card_iin.description: The IIN of a credit-card number.

card_last4.description: The last 4 digits of a credit-card number.

card_expiry_month.description: The expiry month of a credit-card.

card_expiry_year.description: The expiry year of a credit-card.

original_balance.description: The balance on a gift certificate when it was purchased.

starting_balance.description: The balance on a gift certificate at the time of this purchase.

remaining_balance.description: The remaining balance on a gift certificate.

status.description: The status of a gift certificate: `active` - gift certificate is active; `pending` - gift certificate purchase is pending; `disabled` - gift certificate is disabled; `expired` - gift certificate is expired.

remaining_balance.description: Remaining balance of shopper's store credit.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
